overview: Public transportation, horny guys, and hot chicks...you'll never believe what Los Scandalous films got their hands on this time! Real security cam and cell phone footage taken first hand on an actual city bus. You'll see real uninhibited passengers fuck without a care in the world. Ever wonder why those seats are so grimy? If you're into the real possibility of hookin' up with a hot chick you just met on the metro, then maybe you should seriously consider leaving your gas guzzler at home and using the "Ass Transit"!
title: Ass Transit
